question: The "Par force hunting landscape in North Zealand" is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in which country?
explanation: Par force hunting landscape in North Zealand is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in Copenhagen, the capital of Denmark, in North Zealand Island. In 2015, it got inscribed as the UNESCO World Heritage Site. This landscape comprises of Store Dyrehave; Gribskov Forests; Dyrehaven forest park or Jaegersborg Dyrehave. This landscape lies adjacent to Lake Esrum and Frederiksborg Palace.
